Description: Sex of the individual where 0 is female and 1 is male
Annual reproductive success measure: number of offspring the individual had that year that reached at least 1 year old
Presence of helpers in the natal territory as a binary variable (0 - no and 1 - 1 or more helpers)
Presence of siblings in the natal nest as a binary variable (0 - no and 1 - yes)
Dominant male ID in the natal territory
Age of mother when the individual (ID) hatched
Age of father when the individual (ID) hatched
Age of dominant male when the individual (ID) hatched
